---
title: "Books"
---

```{r setup, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(here)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(kableExtra)

website_path <- here()
```

```{r books, echo = FALSE}
prepare_column_names <- function(raw_names) {
  raw_names %>%
    str_replace("__", "\\") %>% 
    str_replace("_", " ") %>% 
    str_to_title()
}
books <- read_csv(file.path(website_path, "_data", "books.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE)
names(books) <- prepare_column_names(names(books))
books %>%
  kbl() %>% 
  kable_material(c("striped", "hover", "responsive")) %>% 
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = TRUE)
```
